meanings.definition: Moving or capable of moving quickly
meanings.sent1: The cheetah is the speediest animal in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The speediest car in the race zoomed past the others effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The speediest squirrel in the park always beats the others to the acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her speediest reflexes kicked in when she dodged the flying ball.
meanings.sent5: The speediest river flowed swiftly through the valley, carrying everything in its path.

meanings.definition: Done or achieved in a short amount of time
meanings.sent1: The speediest solution to the problem was to ask for help.
meanings.sent2: She completed the puzzle in the speediest time among her friends.
meanings.sent3: The speediest way to finish homework is to focus and work efficiently.
meanings.sent4: His speediest decision was to choose the first option presented to him.
meanings.sent5: The speediest route to the store saved her a lot of time and energy.

meanings.definition: The fastest or quickest in a particular situation
meanings.sent1: In the race, he proved to be the speediest among all the participants.
meanings.sent2: The speediest of the delivery services always gets packages to customers on time.
meanings.sent3: The speediest eater at the table finished their meal before anyone else.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the speediest problem solver in the office.
meanings.sent5: The speediest sprinter crossed the finish line with a burst of energy.
